comments:
Build 20011105

It is not possible to use VCM (CVS) with that build.

1. Select a project
2. From its context menu: Team -> Synchronize

==>

Latest build submission is missing PServerConnection class. As a result you 
can't connect using pserver in the current build. This was a result of prep 
work for open source which included removing history for some files.
*** Bug 5601 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Get the latest build (20011106), it's fixed there.

Fixed in v208
